ThingDef.label: alien leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped alien skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.

ThingDef.label: thick alien leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped alien skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
